titleStmt.title: A new sonnet, shewing how the goddess Diana transformed Acteon into the shape of a hart. to a new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of London,

notesStmt.note: Printed on same sheet with Wing (2nd ed.) L3482 (A lullaby).
Cf Wing (2nd ed.) N776F, which has no imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
